website_summaries.verdict: The best child's costume for both girls and boys wanting an immersive play experience.
pros: Multi-prop costume comes with several accessories such as a belt, hat, and walkie talkie
cons: Threads and stitching can come undone in the wash even though it is marked as machine-safe

customer_reviews.title: VERY nice costume!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old son LOVED his Halloween costume! He found the box early, put it on & refused to take it off! Note, the pants have an elastic waist. So, you have to tuck the shirt (Velcro closure) into the pants & just put the belt around them (no belt loops). Material is thin, which is good because it is usually hot in MS on Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: AHD4ever

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am LIVID!!! My baby saved up to get his new uniform and it’s CRAP!!! It tore up when I put it on!! He don’t care but I want to curse! His other one lasted 3 years and he is 5 now!! Amazon get this off your site! Even the hat and holster cheaply made. There is a belt and NO belt loops. My mom is going to sew it back together but I’m pissed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shree Adams

customer_reviews.title: This is not allowed to be called a costume in our house!  It is a legit UNIFORM!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old is living his best life with his REAL uniform! He absolutely loves this thing! We have had to wash it several times because he lives it and it shows zero wear and tear. The little patches are still completely attached. It does run a little big, but that is a huge bonus in my opinion! It was tricky to find a plastic gun to fit in the gun holder, but we found on at the Dollar Store! He loves his radio as well. He did break the whistle rather quickly, but yet again, I am way ok with it!
customer_reviews.author: LeAnne Vassar

customer_reviews.title: Amazing look
customer_reviews.text: Love this costume the only issue was that my son typically wears a size 7 so I ordered medium and it was way too big. I returned it and got a small. Even though the pants fit perfect, the sleeves of the shirt were too short so I had to cut them. Other than that the quality of the costume is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: The size small 4-6 fits my 5 year old perfect with a little grow room even. She normally wears a size 5 or 6. She has been wearing it for 3 days and playing cops and robbers with her older brother so definitely worth the money. I think the quality is good enough that it will last for Halloween too
customer_reviews.author: Teach82

customer_reviews.title: A+..Extremely nice looking police outfit
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!!! Please get this you will definitely not get disappointed. Extremely good quality. Wow.... There were people dressed as police officers for Halloween at my daughter's school and my daughter still won the best Halloween outfit. It looks sooooo real. The gadgets are amazing making it look so real and brings everything together. You will not regret I promise! Funny story, we got pulled over on my way home with my daughter at the back with her lovely police outfit on. The officer thought it was Hilarious and she looked better than him...lol
customer_reviews.author: Rosetara

customer_reviews.title: No toy gun... WE LOVE THAT!!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves to play dress up. All of last year, his favorite was being a construction worker. This year, he got this police officer costume for Christmas and we can hardly get him to go without it. He is about to turn five, and there's plenty of growing room for a long time of fun. It is extremely well made and we all loved that the outfit did not come with a toy gun. He's never missed or even asked about one! He uses the holster to hold his flashlight. This costume is Granna and parent approved and highly recommended by our family!
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana G.

customer_reviews.title: LOVED this costume!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew for Halloween, and he absolutely LOVED it!!! The shirt and pants are of decent quality, and look so legit. The belt, holster and walkie-talkie all help to make the outfit. He wore it with a pair of black rain boots, and he looked like a real state trooper. Everyone who saw him commented on how real he looked. He was so excited to be Officer Anthony for the day. Highly recommend this outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Cardone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect costume!
customer_reviews.text: Listen.... This thing is an exact replica!!!!! My daughter got so many compliments on Halloween at how real it looked. We ended up buying cheap handcuffs from the Dollar tree and it fit perfectly In the "gun holster" since I decided on no toy gun, and you wouldn't even miss it! If your debating about it just go ahead and buy it. It's a little thin but nothing serious and the belt that came with it was an actual good quality belt, and the had is adjustable which is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sugarplum

customer_reviews.title: Cute but poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this outfit and doesn't care that it is so cheaply made that before he ever got it on the epelets were coming apart and the plastic buttons couldn't even be sewed back. I would have immediately returned it but didn't dare disappoint him. Just a little better plastic and construction could have made it worth the price after all it wasn't cheap. I thought it was advertised as premier. 2 stars are too many but Jack loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Scalici

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible. I don't know how this costume got so many 5 Stars. It's cheap, and the hat is terrible. I'm buying another costume because this one is so bad. I'm returning it. I do not advise anyone to buy it. The brim is a hard plastic. It arrived rippled as you can see in the photo. It will not bend, so I cannot straighten it. The belt is cheap. The holster is cheap. It's just junk.
customer_reviews.author: M Hall

customer_reviews.title: Best police costume!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest police costume for a boy! I purchased a small (4-6) for my son who, at the time, was 6 years old & only about 42-ish lbs (skinny /average height). He still wears it a year later and it’s awesome. It doesn’t come w handcuffs but I got some on Amazon for ~$7, which work perfect! You won’t be disappointed in this costume for any boy who wants to be a police officer!
customer_reviews.author: Mackennasmom2011

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cheap cheap
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to my 5 year old for his 5th birthday and within 2 days the pants were completely ripped. After a week several buttons had fallen off the coat. Sadly, the quality of this suit for the price is not worth the money. The patches on the suit are nice and the coat itself is nice. I was highly disappointed, and my son is very sad his birthday gift ripped so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ilove2giggle95

customer_reviews.title: Little Policeman
customer_reviews.text: I gave this costume to my grandson because he loves to be in character. He was super excited to get this because it looked so authentic on him. The fit was great and the accessories were nice. He played policeman most of his Fall Break. His dad sent a photo of him to their detective friend from Acworth, GA. Since I am a retired teacher, I made additional props like a sign that said, "Police Station". I also gave my grandson some copies of what a ticket might look like and talked to him about giving warnings, etc. It was a wonderful experience for him and his siblings. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: ameliabedelia18

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous kids costume. This one is VERY well made with alot of attention to details. My 6 year old LOVES it. He wears it until bed and puts it on first thing in the morning. He has gotten lots of compliments on it from friends around our neighborhood (he wears it while riding his bike). I would highly recommend. He is a smaller 6 (40 lbs) and the 4-6 fits him great with enough room to grow but not enough to look over sized for him. Also came in this nifty little garment bag! Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: ssmith

customer_reviews.title: Good buy runs big
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this was adorable! It was good quality, runs big. I got a small my son is a 6 shirt/pants in boys fit great. The pants are strecthy in waist band has elastic if that helps. Comes with a whistle hat play radio belt and gun holster (no gun) very nicely made
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: the cutest little police outfit with great quality!
customer_reviews.text: My son had his 4th Birthday and wanted to be a lego police. this suit did the job! The quality and details are well made. Only thing is keep in mind it comes with no gun, only a belt gun case. So that you must buy separately. Also there is no police badge or handcuffs, and it was essential my son had his gun, badge and handcuffs. My son is a tall 4 year old and the 3-4 fit him perfectly, he can probably wear it for at least another 6 months. My 5yr old soon to be 6 who as well is tall for his age fit just perfectly in the x-small.
customer_reviews.author: Melly

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This costume is seriously adorable. It’s the nicest police officer costume I’ve ever come across. My 4 year old son was so thrilled with it he couldn’t even take it off for our trip to the grocery store! He turned a lot of heads and many people asked where the costume came from. Great purchase. Happy kid!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Pick this costume! Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Order this one! So many compliments on how realistic it is! Great QUALITY! I promise!! My child plays dress up in it all the time! I added some $1 dollar store handcuffs to the belt. I zip tied the walkie talkie to the belt also to keep it attached securely. 100 percent would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Love to Shop

customer_reviews.title: That's one cool Policeman!
customer_reviews.text: Great costume! My little guy gets SO many compliments everyplace we have been so far. The attention to detail and quality are awesome. So far this season he has worn it to 3 different costume parties. The whistle has been a big hit with him he loves it! The whistle did fall off at last event...but he had been really hard on it. I think it will be easy enough to reattach. Be prepared to buy the handcuffs and gun seperatly. The costume comes with hat,shirt,pants, whistle, belt, and holster. I would recommend anyone to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jami chappell

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality.
customer_reviews.text: My little girls looks so totally awesome in this and her aviators. She wanted to be a stop sign for Halloween, but I talked her into a cop with a stop sign. She really is a kind of "the buck stops here" kinda gal. The whistle is really annoying and blows spit everywhere. I have been thinking of putting a dog whistle on it...... I'm not sure my nerves can take it all night.
customer_reviews.author: Momma

customer_reviews.title: Adorable costume but not durable
customer_reviews.text: The cute gold trim ribbon on the hat started to fray within two hours of my son wearing this costume. Also a pocket button literally fell off when we tried to button it. I swear this is falling apart before our eyes! Very cute costume but not durable at all. Maybe I received a defective item
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Well made, authentic-looking costume, great accessories.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson flipped over this. I love the authentic-looking details in the costume and he loves all the accessories. (Please note: handgun is not included.) The Velcro closure makes it so easy to put on and off. The hat is better looking than others I looked at and is fairly sturdy. This has been a good choice for my active 6 year old grandson.
customer_reviews.author: pstood

customer_reviews.title: Real Policeman
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was adorable in this! This was one of the best items I have ever bought on Amazon. I would buy from this seller again. The costume was very realistic ,Fit perfect for the size stated. I was very impressed with the entire costume .It was well-made and I felt like I got a great deal for what I spent! Very Happy and have recommended this seller to many of my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Mary  McKinney

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this child cop costume for my 5 year old for Halloween. I absolutely love it ! It fits him great and he looks adorable. It comes with the shirt, pants, belt, hat, walkie talkie set and holster. I am so happy with this purchase and cant wait til im his escaped prisoner for Halloween .
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! This is sooooo cute! I can't wait for my granddaughter to see this and put it on! She will love it! UPDATE: My granddaughter absolutely LOVED it!!! She wanted to sleep in it, lol. She also wore it to the playground and arrested all the other kids there, much to their delight, lol. So glad I got this for her. Her mother said it was quality made and it fit her so well, except the belt was a little big, but still it was a huge hit with her.
customer_reviews.author: Janeen

customer_reviews.title: My idea was perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this fantastic costume for my grandson, and he was the hit in his neighborhood. Everybody had comments, about how good he looked. I also got the handcuffs and megaphone, which is very loud. He acted like a real policeman. He arrested several people, and blew his whistle at cars, telling them to slow down. He just turned 4 years old, and adorable. The suit is very well made, and his cousin can wear it next year.
customer_reviews.author: C Smith

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Stop looking and buy this now! Bought this for my son for Halloween. It’s now January and he’s worn this at least 3 times a week since Halloween and it’s been washed every time (he’s 5 and gets it dirty) this costume has held up so well even with all the washes and looks just like it did when it came out of the box!!
customer_reviews.author: vdf519

customer_reviews.title: Awesome uniform
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson, who was 4 at that time. He loves it still. He wants to be cop he says and wears this when he wants to act like a cop. I would recommend this for the children who like dress up!
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! He loved it & looked like a real cop.. The waist of the pants fit weird. They have a really thing elastic waist band & once pulled up, they kind of bunch up & look awkward but the shirt covered it & he didn't care. Over all, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Molholt

customer_reviews.title: Love this costume
customer_reviews.text: Love this costume! Today my son wore it for costume day at school and before we went to the doctors and so many people complimented it and when I checked him into school. The quality is great for a costume. The gun holster is fabric so that parts not the best quality but the again it's a costume. was disappointed that the walker talkie didn't come with it even though it's suppose and I cannot figure out how to contact the seller about it but not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: ABourgeois

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: The best police dress up ever for my little one! Better than Halloween costumes from party city that cost about the same amount. He loves it so much and plays with it everyday and everything is still intact. I purchased size small for my 5 yr old and it is a big loose on him but I know he can grow into it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My son wanted to be a policeman for Halloween and this costume was a hit! It has four main pieces, the hat, top, pants, and belt. It fit as expected although the pants were a little long, and my son is tall for his age. We just rolled them up once at his waist, which solved that. The top opens to the front with a long continuous strip of Velcro that runs down the length of the top. Great material and very official looking. We purchased a the Police Role Play Kit to go along with this and the costume could not have been any better! My son now uses this costume for dress up. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but serves the purpose.
customer_reviews.text: The price is too high for the quality. But it served the purpose well. My kid wanted to be a policeman for halloween. Cons: The shirt is very flimsy and had to make him wear another shirt underneath for the weather. The pants were too loose around the waist. The walkie talkie didn't stay put on the belt. Pros: Looked amazing. Got great pictures and a lot of compliments too
customer_reviews.author: playtime

customer_reviews.title: Quality costume
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Halloween costume for my 5 year old son. I was pleasantly surprised when it arrived as I was expecting typical subpar quality & materials that are usually found with children’s costumes but NOT this police costume!! This costume will last until my son outgrows it or longer, so I guess I should go ahead and order the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wisen

customer_reviews.title: Makes your child a STAR!
customer_reviews.text: Caeden (3 years) wore this to a "Coffee with a Cop" at a Starbucks in Bellevue, WA. He was a STAR! Many comments of "0h, how cute!); many photos taken. A police officer asked permission to use his picture on their social media. Very fun! Costume is very realistic and cute. Very much worth the reasonable cost. Only problem is that the whistle broke quickly--but, perhaps, that was a blessing...🙂 G. Lee
customer_reviews.author: Glynna R. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and well made.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my little 3 year old nephew who wants to be a "Plees Ofzer" and it's so cute! He's a big boy so I ordered a small so he can wear it for a while. The fabric has held up well to playing and comes with every thing listed.
customer_reviews.author: Jen N.

customer_reviews.title: I was happy to see that they were not iron on decals ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really well made uniform. The patches add a touch of realness to the uniform. I was happy to see that they were not iron on decals that would wear off. They are real patches like an officer would have on his/her uniform. My husband is a Police Officer and he liked the way this looked as well. The belt that comes with this is very nice. It isn't a cheap piece of.. It has a lot of belt holes with reinforced brackets (...?) so it looks very put together. My little boy loved this too. He has wanted to wear it all day every day since he opened it on Christmas morning.
customer_reviews.author: H. Woodward

customer_reviews.title: awesome for kids
customer_reviews.text: this was so well made it was worth the money compared t those cheesy vests. the outfit was so cute on my grandson. the only issue is the walkie talkie should be made a little tougher. it broke but I was able to glue it back together.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine2go

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for Halloween - Size Runs a Bit Big
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my tomboy :) four-year-old daughter. She typically wears a size 5 or 6, so I was worried about orderding the size 4-6, but it was perfect. The shirt is velcro down the front (behind the buttons), so easy on and off. The pants are elastic waist, so it fit her just fine. Had to cuff up the bottoms. Agree that the belt is really thin and the buckle will not hold - so I will be using double-sided tape to hold the belt on for Halloween. Otherwise....great costume!
customer_reviews.author: K8tica

customer_reviews.title: Missing equipment
customer_reviews.text: There was no whistle or walkie talkie and it clearly shows that in the picture provided on Amazon. I was disappointed, especiallyfor the price I paid. I would send it back if not for the overtime I am doing at work
customer_reviews.author: Liz Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Too Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a small, which fits my 4 year old, who is a size 5T. She has a little room to grow in this. My little girl LOVES this costume!!! She has arrested everyone it the house! It has a whistle, a belt with a holster to hold the walkie-talkie. If your little one loves to dress up, you won't be disappointed with costume.
customer_reviews.author: kkellykel

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I really was surprised by these! The sizing was pretty true, though the pants were way too long in both the 2t and s that we got. But the shirts were perfect! The accessories were plastic, but decently made for the price. I've got a feeling these will hold up in our dress up box for a long while now that Halloween is over!
customer_reviews.author: Robin K

customer_reviews.title: Missing the belt
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes it. A few issues that include the material is extremely thin and he is 5 and half but the 4-6 size seems a little on the small size. But since it’s just going to be used for a couple of days those are ok. The key problem is it’s missing the belt that holds everything together. Not sure if that’s the seller’s or Amazon’s fault. Guess I will have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Zhou yu

customer_reviews.title: Adorable costume!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old son and he loves it! It is not cheap looking and even has some nice accessories. We had ordered an additional accessory pack because he wanted more stuff, but the items with this costume were of much better quality than the extra accessories that we had ordered. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: A. Rehak

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little large
customer_reviews.text: This costume is very well made and high quality. Did not smell. My almost 3 year old normally wears a size 4T, I ordered a small and it was a little large on him. I folded the cuffs and it worked just fine, I guess he can wear it again next year.
customer_reviews.author: Ann N.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of compliments!
customer_reviews.text: My son (3 yo) wants to be a cop when he grows up (so far). He wanted his 3rd birthday party to be about Police Officers. I bought this costume, took him to the nearest police department (who gladly gave us a tour), and this uniform received a lot of compliments. :)
customer_reviews.author: Shailyn

customer_reviews.title: kids police costume
customer_reviews.text: Its ok as far as costumes go. Very cheaply made with cheap fabric, the hat was completely out of shape and mangled when we opened everything up. The holster looks like it could fall apart at any second. The things I did like was that it has a velcro front which allows your child to get in and out of it easily and without needing help from an adult with buttons and things like that and it came perfectly packaged on a hanger in a small garment bag. I thought that was classy and cute.
customer_reviews.author: B Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Size for 4-6
customer_reviews.text: A wide range for size. My son is 5 and the fit is big in some parts like the sleeve and the body is too small. Pants are way to big. For other ages its age specific but this size is for a range of ages. Fabric is not the best. Very plastic nylon fabric. Would not recommend wearing for an extended amount of time. Returning item.
customer_reviews.author: chanzoo

customer_reviews.title: Very realistic!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this costume! My sons received so many compliments at the many halloween parties we went to, as well as trick or treating. Another halloween has come and gone since purchasing this costume, and my kids still wear this at least once a week. It washed up very well on gentle cycle, and air dry. My husband made the mistake of throwing one in with regular kids clothes once and the "police" writing on the back faded a bit, and the shoulder seam came loose. I was able to tack it back on, and these costumes continue to hold up!
customer_reviews.author: MomOfThreeBoys

customer_reviews.title: Adorable costume but cap was misshapen and awkward
customer_reviews.text: I will start this by saying that my son looked awesome in this costume and the outfit itself is really great. He got so many compliments, mostly from dads. I think people appreciate seeing a kid dressed up as a normal person rather than a TV character or something. The problem with this costume was with the cap: it was misshapen and hard to keep on his head. I tried to contact the company to get a replacement for the cap but had no luck. I would have had to return to Amazon. I bought too close to Halloween and the rest of the costume was so cute, we just kept it and he still looked great.
customer_reviews.author: nr danilowTop Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful if you have a little one that wants to be a a cop.
customer_reviews.text: This costume is very authentic. It is a perfect replica for NYC police officers. We actually had patrol cops see him on the street, stop get out of their car and take pictures with our little one, made his day. It runs a little big which is plus, can wear for a few years. Cute accessory pack, belt, whistle, walkie talkie and holster. I found it to be a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Why Bezos wins.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.text: So we had purchase a cop costume from the halloween store cause that's what he wanted to be this past year but the quality was really bad. So I went searching on amazon as I usually do and found this and let me tell you how AWESOME this is. He looked great and everything was such good quality that came with it. He's a size 5T and is wearing the size small
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: It was a cute costume for my daughter but the fabric was thin and the walkie on the shoulder would not stay and the star kept falling off. Otherwise it was adorable and served its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: This was a really great costume! I was very happy with the quality with two exceptions. The walkie-talkie would not stay in place and one button popped off before we could use it on Halloween. Therefore I gave this product four stars instead of five stars. I would say however that this is one of the best kids’ costumes I’ve purchased for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfection
customer_reviews.text: bought this as a birthday gift for a neighbor boy who wants to be a policeman in the worst way. Gave it to him on Friday and he wore it every day that week end. In order to wash it, he wears the hat with whatever outfit he has on at the time until his uniform comes out of the washer.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie 777

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very good material, fits perfect. I love all the accessories, my son usually don't let the clothes for long time, but he is so comfortable wearing this costume.
customer_reviews.author: Paulina Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for play or Halloween
customer_reviews.text: Let’s face it - we as parents have accepted that most kids costumes are cheaply made and barely last. Not this one! What a great value for a nicely made costume...with accessories! The fit matches as advertised. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S. Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed!!
customer_reviews.text: I could not be more impressed with this costume! It is awesome! It's not cheap looking like most police officer costumes I've looked at in stores! Only complaint I have is the belt is way too big! But this still would not keep me from giving this costume 5 stars! We laughed so much at our son when he first put this on... It looks like a REAL mini police officer walking around! He loves it and wants to wear it all the time! Could not be any happier with this purchase and with it being at such a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: For our future protectors
customer_reviews.text: My little man wants to be a police officer so badly when he grows up, so when they had career day at school, this was a no brainer purchase. When it arrived to our house. I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of the materials. The shirt and pants even washed well.
customer_reviews.author: SheoMAADE

customer_reviews.title: Son loves playing dress up as a cop
customer_reviews.text: My son has been wearing this costume for months. He loves it. Material is strong and has held up well. He looked awful cute for halloween and even got a full tour of a neighbors police truck. He was in heaven.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This costume is great. My son is adorable in it and he ...
customer_reviews.text: This costume is great. My son is adorable in it and he loves it! It seems to run a bit small in my opinion. I hope that it still fits my little guy at Halloween. I would say it is a solid size 5/6. It would have been huge on any of my kids when they were a size 5. My son wears a 6/7 and this fits just about perfect right now. My only complaint is that it didn't come with all the accessories as well. Wish I could have gotten it all in one purchase!
customer_reviews.author: ggeamom

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this costume! It is very cute and has nicer details than other similar costumes, like colorful patches and nice embroidery. A couple of things could use improvement. It would be helpful if the pants had belt loops, and the walkie talkie clip is too tight for him to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loved this! We played cops all evening
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved this! We played cops all evening. The pants were a little too big, and the shirt sleeves were long, but that can be fixed for now. It gives him room to grow into it. He will play in this for a long time. Of course, the whistle was his favorite. He wanted to be a cop for Halloween, but he left here wearing it. Even went in the grocery store in this. I am glad I ordered this for him. He will get hours of play with this.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: Nice costume
customer_reviews.text: My son is a tall three almost four, and I got the 4-6. It does fit as expected, and really, it's a pretty nice costume for a kid. He tried it on, but he hasn't worn it all day yet. He's SO excited to be a police kid and this costume really made him as happy as could be. The embroidery, the belt, and the hat exceeded my expectations in costume quality. The little holster is more like the costume quality I expected, but everything else exceeded my expectations. The shirt secures with a sturdy velcro, not buttons, which is great for a costume. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Devrie K. Paradowski

customer_reviews.title: complete package
customer_reviews.text: The costume is very complete with everything my kid needed to be a police officer for halloween. The only complaint I have is that the hat received has a couple of sections were the stiching is falling apart and the whistle broke within 2 hours of getting it! Otherwise is a nice outfit
customer_reviews.author: c.c

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. The pictures and both of the descriptions have ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The pictures and both of the descriptions have flaws. In the picture it leads you to believe you will receive a toy radio. In the description it doesn't say radio but says it comes with handcuffs. In the next descption it doesn't come with any of it. It is very misleading. The picture is what I actually received. It will work for Halloween, but I would of purchase the accessories if I knew it wasn't coming with it. Plus this picture isn't in the image either. Not even sure if it's the same product
customer_reviews.author: kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Decent material. Good value
customer_reviews.text: Material good quality- better than I expected. Reasonably priced. Love the additional items like the radio, belt, and whistle. Good quality for the price. Daughter will be able to use in her dress up wardrobe for quite some time
customer_reviews.author: Kim Keller

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this a year ago for Halloween. Since then my 5 year old has used it so often that we’ve got our money’s worth many times over. If your child is into dressing up and particularly as a policeman, you can’t go wrong with this one. A year later, nothing’s torn or broken.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: What a great costume! I was hesitant to spend $30 on a costume... But it was SO worth it. The pants are a bit cheap - just material with a rolled elastic waistband. But it hasn't torn and my son wears this costume very often! Even out as clothing. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Melody E

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Halloween and Playing dress up
customer_reviews.text: For a Halloween costume this one is good quality. I ordered a small for my nearly 6 year old son and it was slightly big but perfect for trick or treating because he usually wears something under his costumes anyway due to the weather. We live in the northeast and it is typically cold by late October. The only issue is the sleeves a unusually short. Nothing a long sleeve undershirt won't fix.
customer_reviews.author: T.S.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson and he was delighted! It is well made and will surely last through many costume changes. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Ibuy

customer_reviews.title: **HIGHLY RECOMMENDED**
customer_reviews.text: This costume is very well made. It survived a long and rough career day at school as well as indoor/outdoor play at home. The package arrived very quickly and my little one loves putting it on, over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Quality Costume/No Handcuffs Though
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality costume. Previous reviews mentioned a "worthless" belt. They have improved the belt and it works well. However, previous reviews also mentioned that handcuffs and a baton were included. This is not the case anymore. The only gadget included is a whistle. Still a really nice costume- just know this in advance. I didn't read the costume notes closely enough before I ordered. I relied too much on the reviews. I'm hoping my local dollar store will have some handcuffs to complete the look.
customer_reviews.author: DerfMarq

customer_reviews.title: Cute costume
customer_reviews.text: The pants are a little too long, but my Grandson loves this costume. It arrived as promised & is as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P

customer_reviews.title: It was a hit with everyone... but don't forget to get some accessories!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone, including my 4 year old cousin loved the costume and was very impressed with the quality. I will note that the belt is very long compared to the size of rest of the costume, so I am assuming it is standard on all of them. It had to be pulled up pretty tight, which left a long length of it hanging off the other side. The only thing I would advise is to make sure and buy some accessories to go with it! He immediately wanted to have a gun, baton, and handcuffs.. which I did not consider at the time.
customer_reviews.author: AvidConsumer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZINGGGGGG Quality
customer_reviews.text: DO not waste your time going to a party store for a toddlers cop costume. My babes received compliments all night on their costumes, and they were cheaper than party city. Tons of accesories, whistle, belt, walkie talkies. Literally a perfect costume, perfect price.
customer_reviews.author: Larrissa Economides

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: This Halloween costume looks so realistic. It is a beautiful costume. My son loved it. It is not cheap material, easy to get on as the top piece is all Velcro and the pants, are stretchy you are able to double layer the kiddos for Halloween!
customer_reviews.author: krystal

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This was absolutely adorable and our 7 year old loved it. Got the size small and pit perfectly. Only earned 3 stars because the holster was not included and we had purchased a toy gun to fit in the holster. The badge was worthless, wouldn't stay on at all and we ended up using an old badge I already had.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen  H.

customer_reviews.title: Cute costume the little ones love to wear!
customer_reviews.text: The shirt and hat are adorable & my little guy loves wearing them. It's easy to put on because the shirt has a strip of velcro under the buttons, so the kiddos can quickly put it on & take it off. The pants are cheaply made, and are way too long for the small shirt. My son wears a 5 shirt, and the Small shirt fits him perfectly. If your kiddo is about to outgrow a 6, go to a Medium.
customer_reviews.author: babymom

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It was missing parts but couldn't return because it wouldn't make it back in time for our Halloween party. Ok costume. My daughter loves it even missing and broken pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Huber

customer_reviews.title: Great detail & look, not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: This costume is super cute, but low quality. We lost the buttons at the shoulders with each wear (1st wear 1 fell off, 2nd the other fell off). They were fasteners so I was unable to fix the problem myself. This also runs slightly small. My child is an exact size 6 and this did fit, but was quite fitted. I would actually buy this again because it was by far the best option I found for the looks of it.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Mc

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made costume! I love the that it has embroidered patches, buttons, real pockets, and Velcro's for easy dress up play. The belt has LOTS of holes so it fit my very skinny 5yo no problem. Would highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: JenRen

customer_reviews.title: Great product, super fast
customer_reviews.text: Super fast one day delivery Lots of cool accessories Kids love them. My kids wear 4T-5T and I ordered smalls. Fit great. Will even be able to layer under for trick or treating.
customer_reviews.author: Erin R.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but terrible quality.
customer_reviews.text: While it's adorable, the quality is HORRENDOUS. The hat arrived broken, wonky, and misshapen. The belt is so huge it's too big for me. It looks very real, but it's garbage. My son unfortunately saw me take it out of the box or it would have gone right back to Amazon. The sewing is very bad, and I seriously doubt that it will make it through one washing. Which is very important for a child's dress up costume. My son has been wearing it for 3 days straight.
customer_reviews.author: kindlejunkie

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: My great- nephew loves to dress up. He really liked dressing up like a real policeman.
customer_reviews.author: ClaraMae

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves playing police officer. The costume is wonderful with velcro top. The accessories are a little frustrating as the walkie talkie pops off belt when in hot pursuit or bending over. I love the details and the hat.
customer_reviews.author: kimbacaffeinate

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Costume just came today and is ADORABLE!!! My daughter is so excited to wear it for Halloween! She's 6 and at the top of the height and weight limit listed on the size chart. We did the 4-6 small and it fits her perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: BeccaMomof4

customer_reviews.title: Fun but cheap kids costume won’t last
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this outfit; however, the belt clasp broke within a few weeks and the whistle broke after a month! The string used to hold the whistle was cheap and frayed after a few days so we cut it off immediately. The holster was useless. So it was a big hit for the holiday but won’t hold up very long. Hat will probably be the next to go.
customer_reviews.author: Ann R

customer_reviews.title: Best out there
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Small size for my 6 year old who is about 43 lbs. and I wasn't sure if it would be to small. It fits him perfectly, with a little bit of room to grow. It is made really well and looks great on him. He loves it and wears it whenever he isn't at school. The belt it comes with is hard for him to get on and off, but we just used one of his regular belts for him to use. We also ordered a police badge, some "crime scene do not cross" tape and metal handcuffs. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: jessie_2580

customer_reviews.title: Future cop
customer_reviews.text: Great costume! The was a little more than I was planning to spend for his preschool career day costume, but since he wanted to use it as his Halloweeen costume, too, I bought it. I'm so glad I did! This costume is very well made and absolutely adorable. I know he'll get a couple year's use from this and he absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Awesome police costume
customer_reviews.text: Awesome police costume! My newphew got it first and my sister swore if my son ever wanted to be a police officer to go with this costume. This year that is what my four year old wanted to be and I was beyond impressed with this costume it was well made and he got a ton of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: The sleeves were a teeny bit short but everything else fit great. He looooves it and has been wearing it ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! I got the small for my 6 year old who is tall and skinny. The sleeves were a teeny bit short but everything else fit great. He looooves it and has been wearing it for about a week straight! Yes it is slightly cheaply made but for the price it's great and has held up surprisingly well to a rough 6 year old.
customer_reviews.author: jln

customer_reviews.title: Grandtastic find!
customer_reviews.text: Best costume! Made well, good material, size large fits my 5 yr old (almost 6) girl perfectly, absolutely great design, so happy with purchase, and so is my daughter!
customer_reviews.author: Ginalollobrigida

customer_reviews.title: Best part was the shirt!
customer_reviews.text: Pants were too long and no belt loops for the belt. Buttons that u could really button up instead of Velcro per my 4 yr old grandson. Lol not bad all n all. Liked the permanent patches on shirt.
customer_reviews.author: DONNA

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. Total hit. I’ve washed it so many times and it still fits and looks great. My son loves dress up and this suit is by far the best.
customer_reviews.author: shannon keso

customer_reviews.title: A kids dream
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson for his 4th Halloween. He loved it and especially the accessories that made him feel like a real police officer. The material is comfy and cool as well.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old for Halloween. It is cute, nicely made. The only problem with it was the belt, it was big enough for an adult. Otherwise, it is made very nicely! The reviews on this were totally inaccurate, this was not cheaply constructed. It should come with a toy gun, I had to purchase an additional gun belt to go with the costume, one that contained a gun, hand cuffs and a billy club. Its not Halloween yet and my son is already playing with the costume.
customer_reviews.author: cared99

customer_reviews.title: ... 3 year old son wanted a police uniform so bad. Got this today and he is in LOVE ...
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son wanted a police uniform so bad. Got this today and he is in LOVE with it! It looks so real!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks ADORABLE on my son
customer_reviews.text: Looks ADORABLE on my son! I was pleasantly surprised with how well the uniform fit my five year old son. My son is on the slim side, but the pants have a very stretchy elastic waste and they fit him fine. The hat is a little big and almost awkward fitting on him, but it still works and I am still VERY happy with this purchase! My son LOVES it and didn't want to take it off!
customer_reviews.author: JLS

product_meta.title: Dress Up America Deluxe Police Dress Up Costume Set - Includes Shirt, Pants, Hat, Belt, Whistle, Gun Holster and Walkie Talkie (Small)
product_meta.description:
Size:Small Costume Feature: Dress Up America Deluxe Police costume set for kids - Includes navy blue jacket, Shirt, Pants, Hat, Belt, Whistle, Gun Holster and Walkie Talkie so you can look like a real policeman whenever you wear it 

Realistic look: The extremely realistic looking jacket features an embroidered police patch and 'POLICE' print over the chest, printed letters 'POLICE' on the back, embroidered police patch on both shoulders, real shirt pockets, and gold buttons. 

Pretend play: Your kids will turn into the most awesome appointee when wearing this luxurious Police Officer Set Costume. If your childhood dreams for securing and serving some time, then this set will help him realize his fantasies. Any kid who tries to be a cop will totally love wearing this pretend play Police Officer Costume Set.

Unisex: Boys and girls will be upholding the heavy hand of the law during dress-up play in our Police Officer Toddler Costume. Toy gun, shoes not included

Versatile: Perfect choice for kids' Halloween costumes, theme parties, dress up, events, and everyday fun! 

Additional Features: 
► This Costume is Gentle Machine Washable
► Made with 100% Polyester is hydrophobic in nature.

Why Dress Up America: 

Dress Up America dedicates to provide Amazon customers with excellent service and good quality products. 
Dress Up America is proud to be an independent company featuring a beautiful collection of superb quality Halloween and year-round costumes. 
We feature fancy dress costumes, wigs, exciting accessories in all sizes ranging from infants, boys, girls, teens, men and women. 
We pride ourselves in offering only the highest in quality so please order with confidence: 
Being an authorized seller with thousands of satisfied customers, we are here to serve you. 
Please contact us with any questions. We appreciate your business.
feature_bullets: Police Costume For Kids, Includes: Shirt, Pants, Hat, Belt, Whistle and Gun Holster and Walkie Talkie so you can look like a real policeman whenever you wear it.
Role-Play Police Costume Set: Realistic Looking with Embroidered Patches, Real Buttons, Real shirt pockets with finest Quality.
Made with 100% Polyester Featuring: resistant to most chemicals, stretching and shrinking, wrinkle resistant, mildew and abrasion resistant.
Perfect choice for kids' Halloween costumes, theme parties, dress up, events, and everyday fun!

COMMITMENT TO CUSTOMER SATISFACTION - Dress Up America has been providing quality products and excellent service since 2005. If there is ever any issue with your police costume, please contact us and we will take care of it right away.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,260 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
